get.description: Requests to this endpoint will return `true` if the number is a Whatsapp for Business account, or `false` if it is not.

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: The WhatsApp number must be written as: countrycode and number; do NOT include any non-number character, spaces, or anything which is not a number. Otherwise, the request will not be processed. Examples of correct numbers are: 34123456789 (for Spain) 491234567890 (for Germany) TIPS: Do NOT include '+' before your countrycode. Do NOT include a '-', or any other character or space (anything which is not a number) as part of your phone number. If you do not know which is your country code, check th
